name: King Of Bowling Strike
description:
In King Of Bowling Strike game you swipe your finger to throw the ball, it feels like playing real Bowling game.You can change colour ofyour selected ball it havedifferent mods to play. In this 3d bowling game you can throw the ball like a pro with the best bowling control system. If you love bowling 3d game then this King Of Bowling Strike is best for you.

King Of Bowling Strike: Features:
Amazing 3D graphics
Smooth and easy ball control
Single Player Mode
Two Player Mode
